{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.05123v1", "title": "Recent results of (semi)leptonic decays of charm hadrons at BESIII", "summary": "In this talk, we report the recent measurements of (semi)leptonic decays of
charm mesons from the BESIII experiment, including $D^+\to\mu^+\nu_\mu$,
$D^+\to\tau^+\nu_\tau$, $D^+\to\eta^\prime\ell^+\nu_\ell$, and $D^{0(+)}\to\bar
K\ell^+\nu_\ell$ (where $\ell=e, \mu$). These measurements provide the most
precise or first determinations to date of the CKM matrix elements
$|V_{cs(d)}|$, the decay constant $f_{D^+}$, and the hadronic form factors
$f_+^{D^+\to \eta^\prime}(0)$ and $f_+^{D\to \bar K}(0)$. Lepton flavor
universality of $e-\mu$ and $\tau-\mu$ are also tested with these decays.
Additionally, we present the first observation of the rare beta decay
$\Lambda_c^+\to ne^+\nu_e$ with machine learning of Graph Neural Network.", "main_category": "hep-ex", "categories": "hep-ex", "published": "2025-05-08T10:52:07Z"}
